main event: A Pan American Airlines pilot observed a bright, round disc-like object hovering over Herschfeld on 1 October 1954.
interesting points: The object was oscillating or vibrating while hovering., The pilot estimated the object's rate of climb was much faster than his aircraft's speed of over 400 miles per hour., The object made a very purposeful departure after about 30 seconds., No other aircraft were observed in the area during the sighting., The pilot was certain the object was not any known type of aircraft.
witness description: Captain Richard, a Pan American Airlines pilot
